definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Wong Shi Cheng all brick structures, an area of 2000 square meters.
sentences.chinese: 皇史宬全爲磚石結構，面積達2000餘平方米。

sentences.english: The tower, facing the east, is of masonry structure and pavilion-style with 7 eaves.
sentences.chinese: 塔坐西向東，磚石結構，重檐七級樓閣式。

sentences.english: There are no paved roads connecting the cities to each other.
sentences.chinese: 城市之間沒有磚石鋪成的路來連通。

sentences.english: Our ancestors never used cramps to secure their masonry.
sentences.chinese: 我們的祖先從沒有用鐵箍來固定磚石建築。

sentences.english: In California we retrofit all of the masonry building.
sentences.chinese: 在加州，我們已經翻新了所有的磚石結構房屋。

sentences.english: I am tired of brick and stone and rumbling wagon-wheels;
sentences.chinese: 厭倦了磚石和馬車隆隆聲。

sentences.english: On each side of the emerald there's a diamond.
sentences.chinese: 在綠寶石的兩邊各鑲着磚石。

sentences.english: All the paved roads are inside the cities.
sentences.chinese: 所有用磚石鋪成的路都分佈在城市當中。

definition: lintel (of a door)/fig. family's social status
lit. windswept and battered by rain/to undergo hardship (idiom)
white marble/a type of white marble used for building and sculpting
